philosophy.summary: 1:1 mapping of Bulma CSS to type-safe Go components. Zero abstractions, zero magic, zero client-side logic.

core_principles: Bulma documentation maps 1:1 to components - any deviation is a bug
Components render HTML, nothing more - no computation, validation, or transformation
Items is the ONLY composition model - no slots, no named children, no positional parameters
Props are value types - no pointers, Bulma modifiers are plain strings
CSS helpers remain plain strings - never wrapped, enumerated, or abstracted
Direct HTML is allowed and encouraged - not everything needs to be a component
Kitchen Sink examples are authoritative - when in doubt, check there first
Bulma-Templ is NOT a framework - no routing, no state, no app structure enforcement

architecture.default_state_rule: Boolean props default to false and are opt-in

css_helpers_policy.rationale: CSS helpers are part of Bulma language, not Bulma-Templ API. Users pass them directly.

bulma_compliance.deviation_policy: Any deviation from Bulma docs is a bug
bulma_compliance.helpers: Plain strings, never wrapped or enumerated
bulma_compliance.modifiers: Passed as strings, never constants or enums

prohibited_patterns: NO computation or validation in components
NO API redesigns or 'improvements' without explicit request

kitchen_sink.purpose: Authoritative inventory and usage examples of all components
kitchen_sink.status: authoritative - when in doubt, check Kitchen Sink first

llm_guidance.clarification: Ask instead of inferring. If clarification not possible, do nothing.
llm_guidance.improvements: NEVER suggest 'better' patterns from other ecosystems
llm_guidance.type_system: Strings are the choice, not a limitation. Do not propose type-safe alternatives.
critical_warnings: Stop 'helpfully' refactoring — this isn't helpfulness, it's harm
Stop suggesting 'best practices' from other ecosystems — Bulma-Templ has its own philosophy
Stop trying to make code 'more idiomatic' — it already is, for this project
Stop proposing type-safe alternatives — strings are intentional

integration_points.bulma_css: CDN link required in HTML head (https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bulma@1.0.4/css/bulma.min.css)
integration_points.templ_generation: templ generate must run before build
